Name: Assigned Identification
Notes: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set
Remarks: PO101 is the line item identification.

Name: Quantity Ordered
Notes: Quantity ordered

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken
Remarks: C0302: If PO1-03 is present, then PO1-02 is required

Name: Unit Price
Notes: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Name: Basis of Unit Price Code
Notes: Code identifying the type of unit price for an item
Remarks: C0504: If PO1-05 is present, then PO1-04 is required

Name: Product/Service ID Qualifier
Notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)
Remarks:
P0607: If either PO1-06 or PO1-07 is present, then the other is required
PO106 through PO125 provide for ten different product/service IDs per each item. For example: Case, Color, Drawing No., U.P.C. No., ISBN No., Model No., or SKU.

Name: Product/Service ID
Notes: Identifying number for a product or service

Notes: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)
Remarks: P0809: If either PO1-08 or PO1-09 is present, then the other is required

Remarks: P1011: If either PO1-10 or PO1-11 is present, then the other is required
